page.title: 17NORTH -BRENT - LANGUAGE
page.content: CHILDREN'S GAMES -{Piggy in the middle needs 3 people and a ball. One person stands between the other two and tries to catch the ball whilst they throw it between them. If the middle person gets it, whoever threw it is then in the middle. {Leapfrog. }One person leans over and puts their hands on their knees. The other person stands facing their side runs and jumps over by putting their hands on the others back. {Pom-Pom. }Any number can play. One person is on and covers their eyes and counts to a certain number. The others hide. The person who is on has to try to the others and then goes back to base and shouts 'Pom-Pom 1, 2, 3'. The others try to get to base without being seen first though. Other games are {Bulldog; skipping; {football; hopscotch; cricket; rounders { }
